item.title: Flexibility Over Rigidity
item.description: Resilience comes from flexibility, not rigidity - like redwoods that bend with the wind.

item.title: You Are the Reason - Unknown
item.description: Quote about how love brings light to sadness, understanding to confusion, and trust to betrayal.
